title: Starter sword

properties.name: description
properties.value: The starter sword is a weapon obtained from a Deadman starter pack, along with the starter bow and staff. It has no requirements to wield, and is intended to be used to help a player get started in a seasonal Deadman Mode server.

content:
This item can only be obtained during seasonal Deadman mode tournaments.
It may not be currently obtainable. Players cannot obtain this item in the live game.
Starter sword

Item ID22331

The starter sword is a weapon obtained from a Deadman starter pack, along with the starter bow and staff. It has no requirements to wield, and is intended to be used to help a player get started in a seasonal Deadman Mode server.

Despite being a shortsword, it is classified as a scimitar, with the stats equal to that of a mithril scimitar.

As with all starter weapons, it cannot be used against other players.

[[File:Starter sword detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''starter sword''' is a weapon obtained from a [[Deadman starter pack]], along with the [[starter bow]] and [[starter staff|staff]]. It has no requirements to wield, and is intended to be used to help a player get started in a seasonal [[Deadman Mode]] server.

Despite being a [[shortsword]], it is classified as a [[scimitar]], with the stats equal to that of a [[mithril scimitar]].

As with all starter weapons, it cannot be used against other players.
